HotSauce.name: Hot Girl Hot Sauce
HotSauce.description: Suggested Pairings: This sauce is a wonderful compliment to chilaquiles, scrambles eggs, all tacos, as a chicken wing marinade, salad topper, on pizza, mixed with mayo or hummus for a spicier spread.
ingredients: Tomatoes, Chili de arbol, Chili de adobo, Garlic, Onion, Vinegar, Spices, Water

HotSauce.name: Hot Girl Hot Sauce
HotSauce.description: Suggested Pairings: Add some tang to tacos and quesadillas, breakfast burritos, omelettes, fish, and burrito bowls.
ingredients: Serrano peppers, Tomatillos, Garlic, Onion, Vinegar, Spices

HotSauce.name: PuckerButt Pepper Company
HotSauce.description: The hottest and most dangerous sauce we offer. This is the hottest sauce we can produce, using all-natural Ingredients: Reaper Squeezins is very carefully crafted with the world's hottest pepper, Smokin' Ed's Carolina Reaper®.
ingredients: Reaper Pepper, Vinegar, 92% Carolina Reaper peppers

HotSauce.name: PuckerButt Pepper Company
HotSauce.description: The perfect sauce for those who can handle the heat. The flavor starts floral while the heat slowly builds and lasts. This sauce contains a new pepper that we are currently working to get a new Guinness World Record.

HotSauce.name: PuckerButt Pepper Company
HotSauce.description: This sauce is one of our original sauces from Smokin' Ed's Carolina Reaper®. It's a simple, yet effective pepper and vinegar sauce. You can taste the actual pepper flavor.
ingredients: Smokin’ Ed’s Carolina Reaper®, Vinegar, 65% full of Smokin’ Ed’s Carolina Reaper®
